titleStmt.title: The catholick or universal pill. For the cure of the scurvy, dropsy, jaundice, leprosy, Kings-evil, green sickness, or any other chronick distemper whatsover ...
titleStmt.author: [Holney, John.]

notesStmt.note: Title taken from caption and first lines of text.

At end of text: "These Catholick or universal pills are sold by the persons under written, both boxes and books, being sealed with a coat of arms." With a list of names: Mr. Benjamin Shirley [and 12 others].
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
